issue.title: Implement new reporting for feedback and reporting under DSA

labels.name: priority:p3
labels.description: This priority level reflects our backlog.

issue.body:
We have additional data and categories we need to collect when a user is reporting an add-on to us that contains illegal content, and we also want to differentiate general feedback about an add-on to an actionable report.  The existing inline abuse report component is inadequate for that so it will be replaced with a new form, used for add-ons, account profiles, and collections.

Initially it will just be implemented for add-ons, and behind a feature flag so it won't be available on prod until the full stack is ready.

┆Issue is synchronized with this [Jira Task](https://mozilla-hub.atlassian.net/browse/ADDFRNT-234)

comment.body:
@eviljeff 

I've checked : 
- Location field , which wasn't present yesterday , sent with all options (or none) -> Location field in admin receives what's been sent through the form.  
- Location is optional, mandatory fields are: reason, details and checking the agreement below the detail field.
- with login: the Full Name field is auto-completed with the users's display name,  the e-mail adress is also auto-filled
- logout view: the name and e-mail fields are optional, report can be sent without input from the user, e-mail field required a specific e-mail format.
- I filed an issue on Android https://github.com/mozilla/addons-frontend/issues/12508.

issue.title: Please check this box ... warning is not displayed when unchecking the box
issue.body:
Followup for https://github.com/mozilla/addons-frontend/issues/12432

On Android go to an abuse report form

https://addons-dev.allizom.org/en-US/android/feedback/addon/privacy-possum/ 

Check the mandatory fields : reason, details and the agreement check-box below details of the report 
Un-check the agreement box and try to submit the form 

Expected result:
A warning "Please check this box if you want to proceed"

Actual result:
No warning , Submit report button is active , clicking it won't send the report.

![no warning on Android](https://github.com/mozilla/addons-frontend/assets/33448286/43c6f41a-85b2-4cf7-8f45-277ba782ddbd)

commits.message:
Pontoon: Update Interlingua (ia) localization of AMO Frontend

Co-authored-by: Melo46 <melo@carmu.com>

issue.title: Report abuse against ratings using new feedbackform (behind `enableFeatureFeedbackForm` config)
issue.body:
Reporting a rating should be done using the new `FeedbackForm` component, if `enableFeatureFeedbackForm` config is enabled.

Instead of the feedback/report add-on categories, the user should choose between (copy yet to be approved, subject to change):
- Spam
- Misplaced bug report or support request
- Hateful, violent, deceptive or illegal content

User can be logged in or unauthenticated, in the latter case they can leave their name and email as with reports against add-ons.

commits.message: add location field to feedback form (#12499)

issue.title: Add location field to (addon) feedback form

labels.name: priority:p3
labels.description: This priority level reflects our backlog.

issue.body:
We want to capture if the content being reported to us is in the add-on itself, or on the listing page.  This will depend on an API change to capture this information.

┆Issue is synchronized with this [Jira Task](https://mozilla-hub.atlassian.net/browse/ADDFRNT-241)

pull_request.title: add location field to feedback form
add location field to feedback form

Yarn v2 config changes (#12490)

* Update .gitignore

* Create .yarnrc.yml

* define yarn version

* Delete .yarnrc.yml

pull_request.title: Yarn v2 config changes
pull_request.body:
yarn v2 does things a little different - I didn't bother investigating if any of the new default were better, just tried to keep it as similar as possible to v1 - to get rid of the annoying extra cruft in my local folder.

/.yarn/ is where the downloads get cached
/.yarnrc.yml is where yarn settings are now.  it just has `nodeLinker: node-modules`, which is how yarn v1 works.

issue.body:
Bumps [rc-tooltip](https://github.com/react-component/tooltip) from 5.2.2 to 6.1.2.
Release notes

Sourced from rc-tooltip's releases.

v6.1.2

  • feat: Tooltip ref support nativeElement (#463) c8d83d1
  • chore: So many chores (#460) d023229
  • docs: update demo (#461) 06cb799
  • chore: pick types from upstream (#459) 966131e

https://github.com/react-component/tooltip/compare/v6.1.1...v6.1.2

v6.1.1

  • fix: fix npm files (#458) 88ded8a
  • Update README.md aca75b4

https://github.com/react-component/tooltip/compare/v6.1.0...v6.1.1

v6.1.0

  • feat: pass fresh (#456) f3ffdb1
  • patch: export tooltip ref (#454) 595be48
  • docs: site doc (#450) c5374d7
  • feat: arrow support className (#449) a6285d1

https://github.com/react-component/tooltip/compare/v6.0.1...v6.1.0

v6.0.1

  • chore: fix missing def eb23ffc

https://github.com/react-component/tooltip/compare/v6.0.0...v6.0.1

v6.0.0

  • refactor: Use @rc-component/trigger (#438) fb9d8bd

https://github.com/react-component/tooltip/compare/v5.3.1...v6.0.0

v5.3.1

  • feat: remove *-show-arrow cls when showArrow is true (#433) 2b86fce

https://github.com/react-component/tooltip/compare/v5.3.0...v5.3.1

v5.3.0

  • Revert "v5.3.0" e9ba0fd
  • v5.3.0 abb7d8b
  • Revert "v5.3.0" 74bf8a7
  • v5.3.0 d58ccd0
  • feat: tooltip support show-arrow cls when showArrow not falsy (#430) 187be03
  • feat: update react and react-dom version to 18+ (#431) 61a3286
  • feat: dumi 1.x -> 2.x (#429) 065ac98
  • fix: upgrade rc-trigger from 5.0.0 to 5.3.1 (#360) d7cab0a

https://github.com/react-component/tooltip/compare/v5.2.2...v5.3.0

  • 88ded8a fix: fix npm files (#458)
  • aca75b4 Update README.md
  • 6090a10 6.1.0
  • f3ffdb1 feat: pass fresh (#456)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view
